DOC.brief_summary: This study determine effect 400 mg ketoconazole pharmacokinetics single dose GSK962040 . The result study help estimate maximum increase exposure concomitant use strong CYP3A4 inhibitor . This study also contain exploratory investigation biliary secretion GSK962040 metabolites .
DOC.brief_title: GSK962040 Drug-drug Interaction Study With Ketoconazole
